title: The Secret Map of Starberry Forest

pages.text: One sunny afternoon, <name> packed her little backpack with a sandwich, a notebook, and her lucky red ribbon. She loved adventures, and today she felt something exciting was waiting for her.

While playing in her backyard, <name> noticed a rolled-up piece of paper tucked inside an old flowerpot. She carefully unrolled it and gasped—it was a map! The lines showed a path leading deep into Starberry Forest, where a big star was drawn. “A hidden treasure!” she whispered, her eyes sparkling.

Excited, <name> set off toward the forest. Along the way, she met her friend Lila the squirrel, who chattered happily and decided to join her. Soon they reached a tricky part: a small stream with wobbly stones. <name> almost slipped, but with Lila’s squeaky encouragement, she found her balance and hopped across safely.

Deeper in the forest, the path became darker, and strange rustling sounds made <name> a little nervous. But she remembered her red ribbon—it always gave her courage. Holding it tight, she pressed on until she reached a clearing filled with shining starberries glowing like tiny lanterns.

At the very center stood a small wooden box. Inside were colorful marbles that sparkled like rainbows. <name> laughed with joy. “The real treasure isn’t just the marbles,” she said to Lila, “it’s the adventure we shared and the courage we found.”
With her heart full and her backpack a little heavier, <name> skipped home, already dreaming about her next adventure.
